name: Assembly-Info-NetCore
description: Set assembly or package information such as Version, Copyright and Repository URL's etc.
author: Bleddyn Richards

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder.

inputs.name: FileNames
inputs.label: Source files
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the project file(s).
Wildcards can be used.

inputs.name: InsertAttributes
inputs.label: Insert attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked the task will insert missing attributes into the source files specified above.

inputs.name: FileEncoding
inputs.label: File encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the file(s) encoding.
The 'auto' value will determine the encoding.

inputs.name: WriteBOM
inputs.label: Write unicode BOM
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked the task will write a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the output file.

inputs.name: GeneratePackageOnBuild
inputs.label: Generate NuGet package on build
inputs.helpMarkDown:
If checked will create a NuGet package on a successful build.
Sets the `GeneratePackageOnBuild` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageRequireLicenseAcceptance
inputs.label: Require license acceptance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageRequireLicenseAcceptance` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageId
inputs.label: Package id
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify a name for the package.
Sets the `PackageId` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageVersion
inputs.label: Package version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `Version` attribute.

inputs.name: Authors
inputs.label: Authors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `Authors` attribute.

inputs.name: Company
inputs.label: Company
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the company name for the assembly.
Sets the `Company` attribute.

inputs.name: Product
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the product information for the assembly.
Sets the `Product` attribute.

inputs.name: Description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide a short description that summarizes the nature and purpose of the assembly.
Sets the `Description` attribute.

inputs.name: Copyright
inputs.label: Copyright
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the assembly or product copyright information e.g. Copyright Â© $(date:yyyy) Example Ltd.
See the [marketplace listing](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task) for additional date time formats.
Sets the `Copyright` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageLicenseUrl
inputs.label: License Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageLicenseUrl` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageProjectUrl
inputs.label: Project Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageProjectUrl` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageIconUrl
inputs.label: Icon Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageIconUrl` attribute.

inputs.name: RepositoryUrl
inputs.label: Repository Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `RepositoryUrl` attribute.

inputs.name: RepositoryType
inputs.label: RepositoryType
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `RepositoryType` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageTags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageTags` attribute.

inputs.name: PackageReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the `PackageReleaseNotes` attribute.

inputs.name: Culture
inputs.label: Assembly neutral language
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide information on what culture the assembly supports. Leave empty for non-satellite assemblies.
Sets the `NeutralLanguage` attribute.

inputs.name: AssemblyVersionNumber
inputs.label: Assembly version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the assembly version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).
Sets the `AssemblyVersion` attribute.

inputs.name: FileVersionNumber
inputs.label: Assembly file version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the file version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).
Sets the `FileVersion` attribute.

inputs.name: InformationalVersion
inputs.label: Informational Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the informational version. See the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).
Sets the `InformationalVersion` attribute.
